## Squash Seeds 


<span class="mh">Ingredients:</span>  
<div class="my2cols">
<ul>
  <li>Seeds from fresh squash (delicata or spagetti squash)</li>
  <li>Salt (or seasoned salt)</li>
  <li>Olive oil </li>
  <br><br>
</ul>
</div>
<br>
<span class="mh">Directions:</span> 
<div class="my2cols">
<ol>
  <li>Set oven at 325 degrees </li>
  <li>Separate seeds from guts of squash and put seeds into a bowl</li>
  <li>Add a small amount of olive oil; mix until seeds are lightly coated</li>
  <li>Add salt and mix until seeds are lightly coated</li>
  <li>Spread seeds out on a baking sheet (with parchment paper)</li>
  <li>Bake for 25 min (or until seeds are golden brown)</li> 
</ol>
</div>
